mapper.select: INSERT INTO tbl_board(board_name, map_number, board_price, board_content, board_notice, board_time, board_date, board_category, admin_num, business_user_num) VALUES(#{boardName},#{mapNumber},#{boardPrice},#{boardContent},#{boardNotice},#{boardTime}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{boardCategory},#{adminNum}, #{businessUserNum})
